Package io.github.eutro.wasm2j.api.events

Interface EventDispatcher<S>

Type Parameters:
S - The type of events that can be listened to.
All Known Implementing Classes:
EventSupplier, InterfaceBasedLinker, ModuleCompilation, WasmCompiler
public interface EventDispatcher<S>
A class on which events can be listened to.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T extends S>
    void
    listen(Class<T> eventClass, @NotNull Consumer<T> listener)
    Listen to the given event type.

  • Method Details

    • listen

      <T extends S> void listen(Class<T> eventClass, @NotNull @NotNull Consumer<T> listener)
      Listen to the given event type.

      Only the firing of the exact event type will cause the listener to be run, not subclasses, and not superclasses.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The event type.
      Parameters:
      eventClass - The event class.
      listener - The listener.
